alert.note: Alert for Catoosa; Walker; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 6:53PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ..Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Catoosa, northwestern Whitfield and Walker Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 653 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Wood Station, or 8 miles northeast of Lafayette. Another strong storm was located north of Ringgold. The storms were moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Ringgold, Fort Oglethorpe, Chickamauga, Lookout Mountain, Tunnel Hill, La Fayette, Chattanooga Valley, Naomi, Center Post, Suttles Mill, Noble, Lakeview, Wood Station, Indian Springs, Graysville, Blue Spring, Fairview, Linwood and Boynton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
